Translations.Text: O vos prophet when vos people divortium femina vos ensure divortium interim fulfilled Vos measure such interim precisely Vos reverence DEUS tuus Dominus. Non evict them their domus nor shall vos factus vita miserable them force them sinister on their suus, they commit proven adultery! These est deus juris. Anyone transgresses deus juris commits injustice ipse. Vos nunquam know maybe DEUS testimentum something bonus advenit hoc

Dodum interim fulfilled vos reconcile them equitably iit separation equitably! Vos habet 2 equitable testis testis divortium DEUS! Hoc est enlighten those believe in DEUS Extremum Feria. Anyone reverences DEUS He create exit eum
testimentum provisus pro eum whence he nunquam expected Anyone trusts DEUS He suffices eum. Deus commands perfecit! DEUS DECRETUM everything its fate

Prout pro femina reached menopause vos habet any doubts their interim est 3 mensis. Prout pro those non menstruate invenit they est pregnata their interim finis upon dedit genitus! Anyone reverences DEUS He factus everything easy eum
Hoc est deus command ut He sends down vos! Anyone reverences DEUS He remits his sins rewards eum generously
